title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Amelia White Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     New Mexico Exhibits     Amelia White Park                  Amelia White Park         "A Two Way Street" wayside exhibit National Trails Intermountain Region  A Two Way Street This exhibit is located in Amelia White Park in Santa Fe, New Mexico. It focuses on the two-way nature of the Santa Fe Trail, and highlights the contributions of Hispanic traders to this international highway of commerce. NPS - January 2010
